job_description:
Sinn Studio Inc. is leading the charge in VR combat games! Debut game, Swordsman, is a physics-based combat game where you can slash your way through medieval earth to become the ultimate Swordsman. Having won multiple awards like Game of the Year in 2022, Best Swordfighting Game in 2020 and more. Swordsman also boasts top best seller in Quest and PSVR/2 platforms.

We’re looking for a Lead Programmer / Technical Lead who takes initiative, has drive, and extensive work experience with Unreal Engine and C++. This is a senior-level role that requires previous experience leading a team.

The successful candidate will be responsible for high-level initiative planning and management as well as the implementation of proprietary, genre-defining XR combat technologies. You will be solving novel problems at the bleeding edge of game development. Additionally, the role will support, guide and lead a team of eight to twelve technical staff (gameplay programmers, software engineers, and AI programmers), your vision and your deep comprehension of what everyone does on your team will allow you to harmonize and multiply the results of everyone's contribution.

Responsibilities
Plan and manage high-level initiatives with producer(s)
Manage and support the growth of a team of 8-12 programmers and technical staff (and growing)
Help the studio grow by establishing new pipelines and workflows
Write code standards and convey key designs to technical teams
Find innovative solutions to novel technical problems
Produce project outlines and technical breakdowns for project pitches
Other duties as assigned
Qualifications
5+ years of experience in the games industry as a programmer
High proficiency in C++
Extensive experience with Unreal Engine
2+ years of experience in a senior or lead position
Experience leading and managing a team and supporting their career development
Ability to delegate and collaborate with team members across the studio
Exceptional communication (written and verbal) and articulation skills
Can handle multiple competing deadlines
Empathetic leader with strong listening skills and a growth mindset
XR background and/or PC and console experience preferred
Reliable with strong attention to detail and problem solving abilities
BONUS
Past work on VR games
Experience working with physics systems
Salary Range: $95 - 120k + paid time off and employer paid benefits (except LTD), Employee Assistance Program, personal days and more.

Office Location: Liberty Village, Toronto

Please Send Your Resume With Reel And Portfolio Links To Talent@sinnstudio.com, Please Include The Answers To The Following Questions For Screening Support
Do you live in the Greater Toronto Area?
Are you willing to relocate?
Do you have an XR background?
How many years of experience with Unreal Engine do you have?
How many years of experience with C++ do you have?
How many years of experience do you have managing a team?
Preference will be given to local candidates or those who are willing to relocate to the Greater Toronto Area to work in a hybrid model with two days in office collaborating with local team members and our founders. If this sounds like you, and you’re interested in joining a growing start-up, we want to hear from you!

Sinn Studio is an equal opportunity employer, committed to inclusion and diversity. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, national or ethnic origin, colour, religion, age, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, marital status, family status, genetic characteristics, disability or any other basis forbidden under federal, provincial, or local law, and will not be discriminated against on the basis of disability.

Accommodations are available on request for candidates taking part in all aspects of the recruitment process. If you require accommodation, or if you have any additional questions about the role, please contact us at talent@sinnstudio.com.
